programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent

Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E15 Chair Houdini
programme.desc: An intoxicated inmate escapes his restraints. A young woman denies she abused her mother, and a guard removes an inmate who is causing a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: Guards uncover grooming aids stashed in an unlikely spot while combing through a woman's things. An incarcerated tourist threatens to bring in Johnny Cochran for his defense, and a drunk driver awakens to find X-rated artwork drawn on his body.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E14 Band Brothers
programme.desc: A woman tries to conceal illegal substances in her bra. Bandmates are charged for tresspassing, and two inmates are separated and placed in restraints after losing control.

programme.desc: A fight involving female detainees breaks out after one woman accuses the other of staring at her. A man is arrested for shattering the hotel glass door as a result of a fight. An old crooner believes that rap stars are going to bail him out of jail. Handcuffs don’t stop a woman from trying to flirt with an officer.

programme.desc: A woman who was nabbed for jaywalking claims the police were out of line for arresting her. A woman is brought in on domestic-violence charges, and a drug peddler claims he's selling to support his addiction to poker.

programme.title: Jail

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: A man tries to swallow his ring. A heroin addict wants help when he realizes his habit has cost him everything he loves. A habitual criminal is worried that other inmates will fight over him.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: Cousins come to jail together but only one leaves. Officers contend the best they can with an unruly inmate. Naked meditation in a parking lot lands a street artist in jail.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: An arrested man is caught on camera making a run for freedom. An addict returns to jail and tells officers that meth is controlling his mind. Humility may be the key for one man to quit his life of crime. A shoplifter calls 9-1-1 to help him get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E20 Coopertive Cons
programme.desc: An intoxicated woman clashes with officers but later shows that good behavior pays off. An experienced prostitute gives solid advice to a younger woman and begs her to get out of the “game.” An angry woman smashes her cheating boyfriend’s windshield.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL an unruly detainee is sent to isolation, twice. In Multnomah county a young man feverishly waits for his release. In Portland, OR a man is jailed for bitting his girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. programme.title: Jail

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: A woman is brought in for attacking her boyfriend. A talkative inmate is moved to isolation, and an daring inmate attempts to escape his restraints.

programme.desc: An uncooperative woman is placed in a restraint chair. A troubled woman with a drug addiction is brought in on prostitution charges. One man is taken to a sobering cell to sleep off his intoxication.

programme.title: Jail

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: In Portland, OR an intoxicated male suspect is brought in for DUI. In Salt Lake City, UT a happy drunk woman is pleasantly cooperative. An emotional detainee sheds some tears while in isolation. In Las Vegas, NV a man is strapped in a restraining chair.

programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail

programme.title: Jail

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E34 Domestic Mess
programme.desc: An inmate interrupts the booking process. A couple is brought in after signs of a domestic dispute but claim they were being intimate, and a jailed woman shares some of her Webcam exploits.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: A trustee finds himself in hot water after officers discover his contraband stash. A disgruntled oil worker doesn’t think the charge fits the crime after stealing two hedge trimmers. programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: Prositutes discuss their risqu̩ occupation and explain their fees. An intoxicated woman doesn't want her blood drawn, and two shoplifters face the potential consequences of their actions.

programme.desc: A combative man is placed in a side cell. A transgender woman shares her story. A wild driver is placed in custody, and an intoxicated man is arrested for assault.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: A dominatrix is arrested for playing rough. A father is accused of assaulting his daughter's boyfriend, and an inmate's negative attitude leads to trouble.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Sunshine on a Cloudy Day
programme.desc: A woman who says she’s called “Sunshine” has less than a sunny disposition. A man ditches a halfway house for jail to get his life in order. programme.desc: Officers try to deal with a sloppy and combative drunk. A man gets locked up after he blows all his casino winnings, and a woman gets tricked by her bail bondsman.

programme.desc: Boisterous inmates are placed in restraints after initiating several verbal altercations. A woman struggles with substance abuse following the death of her fianc̩, and two young escorts discuss their "observing" strategy when casino hopping.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E28 Hot Equipment
programme.desc: A suspicious man attempts to flee Police on foot and is later arrested for possession. Officers in New Jersey charge a garage owner with receiving stolen property. Officers arrest a man after witnesses report purse snatching.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E31 Lightening Shock
programme.desc: Officers investigate two vehicles involved in an accident. Officers respond to a call involving a man with a knife. Officers respond to a call involving a man with a gun at a convenience store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E14 Jawbreaker
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, officers stop to talk to a young woman who appears to be soliciting prostitution. A father accuses his son of breaking his jaw. While running from officers, a suspect attempts to drop evidence on the street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E20 Up for Sainthood
programme.desc: Officers pursue two juveniles involved in a carjacking. Two men sitting in a truck are spotted hiding something in the console. A man claims he took drug paraphernalia from kids as a good samaritan.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E26 Pub Rules
programme.desc: A prostitution sting leads police to uncover additional crimes. A prostitute tells deputies she wanted money to buy her daughter a birthday gift. Deputies are called to an assault at a pub.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E09 Crazy as a Loon
programme.desc: Officers conduct a traffic stop on a vehicle that ran a stop sign. Officers retrieve birds from a fireplace and release them outside. Officers conduct a drug-reversal-buy sting to capture buyers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E14 Not Gonna Stop
programme.desc: Despite driving a large SUV and trailer, a suspect tries to outrun the police. A driver tries to hide contraband on his person. Police are called into a domestic dispute involving a husband and wife.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E24 Kick the Car
programme.desc: Officers intervene when an estranged husband kicks his ex-wife’s boyfriend’s car. A man claims someone gave him the car he is driving. A woman claims the pills in her purse are not hers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E13 Shots Fired
programme.desc: An Officer attempts to pull over a car which leads to a high speed pursuit. An Officer encounters an apartment fire. A man is hit by a vehicle in a trailer park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E16 Amnesia Can Happen
programme.desc: Police officers set up a sting operation using a taxi cab in to bust prostitution. A man claims he can’t remember his ‘girlfriend’s’ name when officers suspect the woman is actually a stranger. Female undercover officers set up a sting operation to bust johns.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E13 Wardrobe Malfunction
programme.desc: A suspect flees police in a truck over a misdemeanor traffic warrant. A man denies hitting his wife who has a bloody nose. A man denies ownership of his shorts when deputies find drugs in them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E02 Bourbon and Blood
programme.desc: A man assaults another man for groping his girlfriend. Police make several drug-related arrests while patrolling New Orleans. An adventurous suspect is arrested while scaling down a drainpipe.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E25 Hide and Go Porch
programme.desc: Officers engage in a car chase when they spot a possible robbery suspect. A man nicknamed “Danger” is tasered after assaulting several girls. Suspects bail from a vehicle and hide under a porch.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E02 Voo Doo Curse
programme.desc: A woman claims a man abused her then put a curse on her. Police arrest a man for having illegal drugs on him. An elderly woman locks herself in the restroom at a bank.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E14 We Know Who You Are
programme.desc: Officers are forced to taze a suicidal man for his own good. A familiar face makes cops chase him through a grass field. No lie is too big for a suspect who seeks refuge in a condemned house.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E34 Copy of Warning shot
programme.desc: Officers respond to an assault call at a local residence. A juvenile with a firearm is detained. Officers respond to a report of a man firing a gun in front of his residence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E34 Fast Pase Foot Chase
programme.desc: A high speed vehicular pursuit results in foot chase and subsequent arrest. Officers respond to a domestic call involving the residence’s girlfriend and her children who destroyed the man’s house. Police respond to a domestic violence call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E07 Chainsaw Man
programme.desc: Detectives find a loaded gun while searching a vehicle. Local residents complain about a loud neighbor. A man is spotted walking down a road with a saw.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E15 Graveyard Shiftiness
programme.desc: Officers detect a strong odor of marijuana during a routine traffic stop. A woman tells Officers her inebriated boyfriend smashed a window. Police investigate a suspicious vehicle parked behind a cemetery.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E21 On the Run
programme.desc: Officers pursue two suspects on foot who fled from a stolen vehicle. A drunk driver is pulled over after a brief chase. Officers receive a call for help from a juvenile about an attempted break-in.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E36 Visiting Hours Twofer
programme.desc: Police respond to a report of prostitution in a hospital parking lot. A man and woman engaged in solicitation are pulled over. A woman loitering in an area known for prostitution tries to evade police.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E09 Love Bites
programme.desc: A transgender woman in a wheelchair opens a can of whoop ass on an aggressive bully. Officers find a barely dressed couple in the midst of a biting match. A reckless driver doesn’t take too kindly to being pulled over.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E28 Tell it to My Wife
programme.desc: A man’s wife can’t help him stay out of jail no matter how much he calls for her. One thief tries to give back his stolen loot. When approached by officers, a woman goes from passed out to out of control.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E22 Dealt A Bad Hand
programme.desc: Multiple suspects spill out in a mad scramble when their vehicle flips over in a pursuit. A distraught man complains that a stranger tried to lasso him with a metal necklace. A driver has trouble staying in his lane after a lousy night of poker.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E23 Pass the Rock
programme.desc: A suspect uses bizarre driving techniques to elude cops. A tough officer wades through a forest of denial before finding the crack. Police search for man accused of shooting up the neighborhood.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E11 Rethink Your Wardrobe
programme.desc: A man on the corner is questioned when he’s wearing gang colors in a gang neighborhood. A muscle car spins its tires at a stop light. A woman’s neighbor steals her ‘special’ plants.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E06 Two Too Many
programme.desc: A man fights with his wife over a haircut then leads police on a car chase. A woman gets violent with her boyfriend and then calls the police on him. An intoxicated woman tells deputies she only had two drinks.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E16 Being Honest Goes Along Way
programme.desc: A man leads Officers on a pursuit across county lines. An Officer assists in an undercover sting to capture drug dealers. An Officer finds a gun in a suspects car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E22 Change that Evaluation
programme.desc: A sizable amount of cocaine is seized during a routine search. An officer responds to a domestic dispute call with conflicting stories. An officer’s patrol car is nearly struck by a train.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E03 Who's Girlfriend?
programme.desc: A disastrous carjacking results in an arrest. Officers respond to a domestic abuse call involving two women. Officers find drug paraphernalia on a suspicious man parked in the middle of the street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E21 Don't Make her Angry
programme.desc: A man needs police assistance when his angry ex-girlfriend crawls through his window. Police must play hide-and-seek when they attempt to execute an arrest warrant. A man is threatened with violence when he refuses to turn his car’s headlights off.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E03 Gas up and Run!
programme.desc: A man is tasered twice after struggling with two deputies. A gas station fight ends in a foot chase. A deputy pulls over a pair of quarreling lovers after they run a stop sign.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E06 Sharp Knives and Dirty Donuts
programme.desc: A customer pulls out a knife when asked to leave the store. A man doing donuts in a motel parking lot is questioned about a love triangle. Officers are flagged down by a man who was shot at while riding his bike.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E32 Thrifting and Shoplifting
programme.desc: A vehicle is caught traveling in the opposite direction. A sting operation is designed to nab suspects who purchase narcotics. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local thrift store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E27 Unlucky Strikes
programme.desc: Witnesses of a car burglary assist an officer in locating the suspect. An officer investigates a fight involving a young man and a homeless gentleman. A suspect’s testimony is debunked after an eyewitness confirms that his knife wounds were self-inflicted.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E33 Be Careful What You Ask For
programme.desc: An irate man begs the police to shoot him. A drunken woman gets nasty after being arrested for domestic assault. Cops wade through lies as they make sense of a most dysfunctional family.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E31 Strike the Bike
programme.desc: Police pursue a stolen motorcycle that turns into a foot chase. A domestic violence call results in the arrest of an abusive stepdad. Officers respond after a fight over cigarettes escalate.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E08 Poolwatch
programme.desc: Deputies tase a man who almost ran over a deputy with his truck. A man gives police false information after saving a boy who fell into a pool. A woman tries to buy drugs from an undercover officer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E32 Hit and Run
programme.desc: A man can bail on child support payments, but can’t escape the police. One woman’s retaliation almost gets her girlfriend run over. A sluggish suspect denies the pile of marijuana in his car is his.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E21 Undercover Blues
programme.desc: Police work a sting that targets drug dealers. An undercover sting discovers narcotics trafficking. Police respond to a burglary in progress and discover a flop house.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E04 That’s not Chapstick
programme.desc: Deputies search a suspicious vehicle behind a strip club. A man threatens to shoot employees at a car rental company. A man tosses lip balm filled with narcotics out the window during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E11 Team Rescue
programme.desc: Officers rescue a man from a rushing river. A suspect taunts officers during a slow-speed chase. Officers assist a rescue team with extraction from a car. An officer assists in an apartment fire.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E13 Bike for Sale
programme.desc: A deputy pursues a man who fled from a traffic stop. A deputy chases a suspicious man leaving an apartment complex. Two men claim they are trying sell a bike during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E06 Trouble Brewing
programme.desc: An officer poses as a prostitute in an attempt to attract “johns”. A suspect flees on foot through the woods following an assault. An officer investigates a local bar known for illegal activity.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E18 Bottom Fishing
programme.desc: At the conclusion of an extensive pursuit, the driver eventually loses control and runs into a stop sign. Officers stop a stolen vehicle leaving a known drug house.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E25 Scary Monsters
programme.desc: A resistant suspect thinks he sees monsters everywhere. Cops are forced to officiate a spousal wrestling match. Officers try to sort out where two motorists got their car and whose dope they possess.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E04 There Goes that Alligator
programme.desc: Police arrest a suspect for armed robbery. A six foot alligator is found on a homeowner's back porch. An Officer assists in an undercover sting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E35 Crooked as a Fish Hook
programme.desc: A reverse drug operation proves successful for officers in both Tampa, FL and Palm Beach County, FL. Officers are in search of a suspect responsible for burglary.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E21 Pursuit Assistance
programme.desc: Officers enlist the help of a K-9 unit after suspects in a dangerous high-speed chase abandon their car in a residential area. A woman with visible injuries tells the Officer that her husband assaulted her after they left a drive-in. A woman sprays her boyfriend with mace when she sees him with another woman.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E13 Naked and Tired
programme.desc: Officers are called when two intoxicated suspects decide to have some fun and vandalize a fence. Undercover officers set up a narcotics sting at a hotel. A man is found lying naked in a parking lot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E20 Not My Text Messages
programme.desc: A routine traffic stop turns into a drug bust when cops turn up evidence of the driver's sizable habit. A suspicious man waiting in a parked car can't explain the incriminating texts on his phone. Two frequent flyers give officers a hard time when pulled over in a well-known drug area.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E12 ID Please
programme.desc: Officers pursue a man who attempted to cash a bad check then fled the scene. Police are called when a man’s ex-girlfriend breaks into his house. Police chase an unlicensed teen speeding in a vehicle

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E31 Bruised But Not Broken
programme.desc: Deputies assist an injured woman who vows revenge on her male attackers. A woman tells Deputies her husband beat her in front of their children. Officers protect an elderly woman from an abusive child.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E15 All The World's Our Bedroom
programme.desc: Officers are called to remove a man sleeping in a parking spot at Wal-Mart. A free-spirited couple takes their relationship to their front lawn. A resident brings a knife to a meeting with his building property manager.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E27 Messy Situation
programme.desc: Officers coordinate a prostitution sting in a neighborhood. Officers pull over a vehicle with a missing license plate. Officers stop a woman driving a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E09 Guns, Hash, and Fire Hydrants
programme.desc: A chase becomes a flash flood when a fleeing driver runs into a fire hydrant. An insolent domestic violence suspect claims his girlfriend is a habitual 9-1-1 caller. Officers recover a cornucopia of contraband from a gun-toting couple.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E25 Mailbox Baseball Playa
programme.desc: Multiple units pursue a stolen vehicle on the run. A woman tells Officers her intoxicated boyfriend destroyed her mailbox then fled. A loaded shotgun is found in a vehicle after a brief pursuit.

programme.title: Tom the Tow Truck
programme.desc: Poznaj Toma, wynalazcę z Samochodzikowa! W swoim nowoczesnym laboratorium tworzy wynalazki, aby rozwiązać problemy przyjaciół.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs for Children
programme.sub-title: S01 : E36 Everyday Items Songs
programme.desc: Shall we learn how to apply and use life tools safely with Pinkfong? Fashionable pencil master, marching mask, elegant ballet teacher, reliable medicine ranger, stylish scissors butler, and even cute spoons and forks! With tools friends, anyone can learn in a fun and easy way!

programme.title: Bebefinn
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Episode 9
programme.desc: Baby Finn Learns Something New Everyday with the Funn Family! Here comes another beautiful precious day of Finn, a Baby Shark lover just as our children, and his Family. Enjoy the daily life of the Bebefinn Family filled with joyful songs.

programme.title: Pinkfong Dance and More
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Pinkfong ABC Dance
programme.desc: Every alphabet makes different sounds. Kids will easily be friends with ABCs with a fun alphabet dance along series.

programme.title: Reading Stories with Pinkfong
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Pinkfong Car Stories
programme.desc: Police cars, fire trucks, dump trucks and many car friends are excited to tell interesting stories.

programme.title: Baby Shark the Dentist
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Oh no, it looks like you have a tooth injury, so you've come to the dentist! Dr. Baby Shark will take care of everything for you! Alright, let's start the treatment. Please open wide and say "Ahh"!

programme.title: Ambulance Rescue Special
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: We Are The Pinkfong's Super Rescue Team! We solve all the problems in the town!

programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Episode 1
programme.desc: Shall we go out to meet our fun animal friends in the woods? Fun animal friends are waiting for us, including a pig with a cute twisty tail, a detective squirrel looking for acorns, and a rhinoceros jumping around! Let's all start together!

programme.title: Pinkfong's Snack Time
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Episode 1

programme.desc: Every alphabet makes different sounds. Kids will easily be friends with ABCs with a fun alphabet dance along series. Doo doo doo doo doo doo! For all fans who love our Baby Shark songs

programme.desc: Art-school innovators, cool mavericks and risk-taking heroes all combine in this heady two-hour mix of stars who often pushed music way beyond the confines of chart-based pop.

programme.title: Sing It Loud! 1970-1979
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Sing It Loud! 1970-1979
programme.desc: These are the greatest floor-filling party tracks of the 70s. Every tune an absolute belter, hand picked by the NOW 70s team for you. Turn it up!

programme.title: Shake Your Groove Thing! Top 40
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Shake Your Groove Thing! Top 40
programme.desc: Feelgood & fresh! Dance yourself dizzy with another 40 singalong songs full of fire & fizz! Warning: contains cheese.

programme.title: Disco Fever!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Disco Fever!
programme.desc: Get on the Love train with some top tunes to satisfy those Boogie Nights!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1970
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1970
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits & headlines from the year of Apollo 13, The Beatles split & more happily the launch of "Skippy The Bush Kangaroo" here in the UK!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1971
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1971
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits & headlines from the year Gary Barlow, David Tennant & Clare Balding were born. And the UK said goodbye to pounds, shillings & pence as we went decimal!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1972
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1972
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits & headlines from a year of major cultural debuts - 'Jesus Christ Superstar', 'Are You Being Served?' & George, Zippy & Bungle in 'Rainbow'!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1973
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1973
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits & headlines served with a side or order of flares! It was a busy year for the Queen as she opened the Sydney Opera House & the new London Bridge.

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes from the year Richard Nixon left the US Presidency after Watergate, Prog Rock dominated the album charts & inflation hit double digits. Imagine that!

programme.title: 1974 Unleashed!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 1974 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1974!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1975
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1975
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits & headlines from the year Margaret Thatcher became Tory leader, 'Ding A Dong" won Eurovision, and Fawlty Towers opened its doors for the very first time!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1976
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1976
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of heatwave hits & headlines from a year of contrasts - Punk, Dancing Queen, the Inter-City 125, the Honey Monster & that year's top toy - Swingball!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1977
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1977
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits & headlines from the year Demis Roussos soundtracked 'Abigail's Party', Punk was the new scourge of society, but it was outsold by TV cop crooner David Soul!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1978
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1978
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits & headlines from the penultimate year of the decade when Anna Ford became ITV's first ever female news reader and the TV licence fee climbed to Â£25!

programme.title: 1979 Unleashed!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 1979 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1979!

programme.title: Rick Wakeman's WILD Things!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Rick Wakeman's WILD Things!
programme.desc: Remember when rock was WILD? From '64 to '74 the pioneering heroes presented by a man who was at the centre of it all - from The Kinks to The Beatles to Black Sabbath to Queen!

programme.title: 70s Rock - More Than A Feeling!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 70s Rock - More Than A Feeling!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s feelgood rock & power ballads - they're more than a feeling!

programme.title: Is This Really How They Started?!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Is This Really How They Started?!
programme.desc: Most went onto bigger things - but how did it all start in the 70s? Here are 30 chart & video debuts from household names - some songs are brilliant, but some you might not know

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Lamb Four Ways
programme.desc: There are limitless options with lamb on the grill! Host Spencer Watts offers some tips and tricks on how to prepare four different cuts of lamb.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Fowl Play
programme.desc: Whether for a small family dinner or a big backyard barbeque, host Spencer Watts shows us the best ways to grill up tasty duck, turkey, capon, and quail.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Sides & Sweets with Heat
programme.desc: Never underestimate the power of a good side or dessert! Fun host Spencer Watts grills up the perfect sides and treats for your next barbeque.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Dim Yum!
programme.desc: Warm and talented Cantonese home cook Mary Tang kick starts this One World Kitchen 3 episode by show- casing traditional, evERS-popular dim-sum dishes. First up, juicy Pork-Filled Dumplings! Made with fresh watERS-chest- nuts, shiitake mushrooms and a blend of Asian sauces and spices, these sweet and salty bite-sized creations are to die for! To add to our desire, Mary fries up some savoury Chinese Daikon Radish Cakes in a piping hot wok. Next, a flavourful lotus leaf filled with sticky rice and a medley of salted duck eggs, Shaoxing wine, and dried shrimp is truly hard to resist! To finish off, Mary combines gorgeous Adzuki beans with rice flour and sesame seeds to create airy and full...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Vietnamese food with a French Twist
programme.desc: Lisa Nguyen, a passionate and fun-loving Vietnamese home cook, introduces us to some of her favourite Vietnamese dishes with a French flare. Set in the colourful One World Kitchen 3 kitchen, Lisa assembles a classic Vietnamese sandwich. Golden-brown sautéed onions, salty bacon, tangy pickled carrots and daikon, and flavourful ground pork p'té pressed between two slices of crispy baguette will definitely get your mouth salivating. Next up, hot pork lathered in cognac inside a crunchy golden puff pastry. Moving away from pork, Lisa then cooks up a hearty plate of Shaking Beef with a leafy watercress salad on the side. Finally, Lisa shows us her Vietnamese play on a traditional French...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 Lebanese Culinary Favourites
programme.desc: What better way to start a meal than with dessert? Lebanese home cook Jasmin Ibrahim shows us how to make a gooey cheese pastry doused in sweet syrup called Knafeh. With a buttery golden-brown crust, oozy melted cheese and fragrant rose water, this decadent dessert will surely satisfy your sweet tooth. Next on the menu, a Lebanese classic - pita bread. You'll never buy it from the store again with this delightfully easy recipe! Jasmin then prepares a well-known Lebanese sandwich - you guessed it, Shawarma! Loaded with charred chicken, a popular Lebanese 7 spice mix, and yummy garlic sauce, this might be the best sandwich ever! Finally, Jasmin cooks up a batch of tasty Beirut Spicy Fish -...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E22 Popular Athens Recipes
programme.desc: Greek home cook Joanna Chery kicks off this episode of One World Kitchen by showcasing popular recipes from Athens. She begins by preparing Chicken Souvlaki with Tzatziki, a classic dish featuring succulent, beautifully charred chicken skewers and a refreshing cucumber yogurt garlic dipping sauce. Next, she fries up some deliciously flaky cod with an irresitble garlic-potato dip, a staple recipe for Greece's Independence Day. Another popular dish in the Greek culture is Lamb Fricassee. It includes crispy, browned lamb pieces, juicy beef stock and a lovely egg - so savoury! Don't forget, we need a perfect dessert to follow a rich and hearty lamb dish: fried dough balls. Joanna shows us her...

programme.desc: Summertime is all about being outdoors and fun host Jessica McGovern whips up some sweet treats that are perfect for a summer pool party.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Oil
programme.desc: Chef Spencer Watts makes salmon and prawns pop with flavor as he works with any seafood kitchen's must-have ingredient: delicious flavored oils.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Vinegar
programme.desc: Chef and seafood expert Spencer Watts shows how vinegar, a simple pantry staple, can bring out the flavours of walleye, lobster and crawfish.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Cocktails
programme.desc: Seafood lover and chef Spencer Watts brings the party to the kitchen and shows that cocktails aren't just for drinking, they're also an inspiration for cooking great seafood.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Cold
programme.desc: Cooking doesn't always have to bring the heat. Chef and fish lover Spencer Watts shows you how to prepare cold dishes with arctic char and shrimp.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Irresistible Pork Recipes
programme.desc: Cantonese cuisine often incorporates pork and host Mary Tang shows us three diverse ways to elevate this juicy protein. First, she chops up a sweet winter melon - saving the hollowed out shell to use as a bowl - with spicy shredded scallops and lean pork tenderloin. Then, she whips up a quick and easy pork stir-fry with crispy snow peas and delicious red peppers. Finally, Mary showcases a Cantonese take on barbeque pork. The secret? A mind-blowing marinade. With sugar and honey crusted pork butt, fermented bean curd and a mixture of deli- cious Asian sauces, this tangy dish is worthy of an extra batch. Don't forget, delicately steamed sweet buns take this dish up a notch - Mary offers a...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Vietnamese Street Food
programme.desc: There's nothing more authentic than street food - Vietnamese style! Host Lisa Nguyen shares her tips and tricks on tasty Lemongrass-infused Beef Wraps. A vast array of ingredients including peppery betel leaves, gorgeous greens and crunchy peanuts complement the tenderness of flavoursome, marinated ground beef. Lisa's next dish is an iconic Vietnamese street food - crispy Sizzling Crepes with juicy pork belly and earthy vegetables will definitely activate your taste buds. For dessert, Lisa whips up a batch of sweet coconut pudding using beautiful bananas and velvety coconut milk sprinkled with roasted sesame seeds for some crunch.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Stuffed
programme.desc: The Lebanese love their stuffed foods, and host Jasmin Ibrahim shows us just how to do it! To start, she eloquently crafts golden Spinach and Feta Turnovers. Then, she stuffs a delicious zucchini with tender beef, crunchy nuts, and soft basmati rice, and smothers it in a flavourful tomato sauce. Next up, Stuffed Lamb and Bulgur Balls - small torpedo shaped balls of juicy minced meat, light and nutty bulgur, and a medley of aromatic spices. Her final dish? A date-stuffed cookie called Maamoul. Normally made for special occasions, these sweet cookies burst with flavour.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 Olives: The Most Useful Ingredient
programme.desc: Is there anything more Greek than olives? Host Joanna Chery shows us how versatile the olive really is by cooking up four diverse Greek dishes. To start, a rich, baked-to-perfection Olive Bread loaded with strong, slightly fruity black Kalamata olives. She then prepares a refreshing Greek Village Salad full of seasonal vegetables, creamy feta, and plump juicy olives tossed in extra virgin olive oil. And guess what? It pairs great with fried Olive Bread! Then, Joanna switches it up with wonderful green olives - the star in her delicious stuffing for Apricot and Feta-Stuffed Chicken Thighs. Finally, we're graced with a unique dessert - Saint Fanourios Cake. Joanna adds metaxa (Greek...

programme.title: Spice Secrets
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Comfort + Spice
programme.desc: From Fettuccine Alfredo to Meatloaf, everyday recipes are enjoyed every day for a reason: we love them! Chefs Shahir Massoud and Jasmin Ibrahim use spices to punch up these classic recipes. Meatloaf gets aromatic allspice, and is topped with bay leaf spiked ketchup. Fettuccine gets mustard; both the seed and the leafy green! Bacon and fried rice are ultimate comfort foods, but have you ever tried it with cardamom in the mix? Spice is the secret, a pinch of spice can make a world of difference!

programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.desc: In Hanoi, Rohan relishes local delicacies like Pho and Bun Cha. After this, he visits historic sights, rides a Cyclo and enjoys a water puppet show.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bhutan Phobjikha
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 City Breaks Madrid, Spain
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bulgaria Sofia
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.
