programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bhutan Thimpu
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bhutan Phobjikha
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E32 Backpack Sjenica, Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 10 Days Scotland Edinburgh (ENG)
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Bulgaria Plovdiv
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.title: From Wheelchair to Race Car - How Robert Wickens Overcame the Odds
programme.desc: In 2018, a horrific crash at Pocono nearly ended Robert Wickens’ life—and seemingly ended his racing career. He suffered a double spinal cord fracture, multiple broken bones, and a severe pulmonary contusion. By the end of that year, Robert revealed he was a paraplegic. But Robert Wickens is not like most people. This is the story of a man who refused to be defined by the crash that changed everything. Through unwavering determination, incredible resilience, and the cutting-edge technology of Bosch Motorsport, Robert set his sights on an unthinkable goal: to race again at the highest level. This isn’t just a story about recovery—it's about rediscovery. About holding onto your...

programme.title: Michael Schumacher at Le Mans
programme.desc: In 1991, before his stellar F1 career, Michael Schumacher raced for Mercedes at Le Mans - and had a legitimate shot at winning the most prestigious endurance race in the World. Autosport Editor-in-Chief Kevin Turner narrates the story of this dramatic race, and explains how the lessons Schumacher learnt in these 900bhp cars shaped his career in F1, and assisted him in some of his most famous races.

programme.title: Seven ways F1 teams covered up tobacco advertising
programme.desc: Ferrari and McLaren both changed branding on their cars for the Australian Grand Prix, due to complaints about their links to tobacco companies. That brought back memories of when several teams on the grid carried full-on tobacco sponsorship, and they would have to change their liveries when racing in countries where cigarette sponsorship was outlawed. In this video we take a look back at seven popular methods that were used by teams during this period.

programme.title: Nine times F1 drivers lost maiden victories
programme.desc: Charles Leclerc’s heartbreaking lost victory in the Bahrain Grand Prix brought back memories of other times in Formula 1 history that drivers missed out on a maiden win. In this list we take a look at some of the most painful of those stories, and the variety of reasons that robbed drivers of their first chance to stand on the top step of an F1 podium.

programme.title: Five moments that shaped F1's first 1000 races
programme.desc: Formula 1 celebrates the 1000th world championship race this weekend in China, and to kick off the festivities we're looking back at races from its history that have defined the way F1 has changed over the years. Join Edd Straw and Stuart Codling from the paddock in Shanghai to take a journey through some of the most important moments that have got us to the 1000th race

programme.title: Top 10 Senna Moments
programme.desc: Qualifying performances from "another dimension"; thrashing his rivals repeatedly in torrential wet conditions; doing whatever it took to win the world championship at all costs. Ayrton Senna's too-brief time in Formula 1 was a colourful tapestry of brilliant driving and high-stakes controversy. On the 25th anniversary of his tragic crash at Imola, Autosport brings you the most unforgettable moments of the late Brazilian's F1 career.

programme.title: Episode 6: Hellas Rally Raid and Monster Jam
programme.desc: Gearing Up is back with another thrilling episode that takes you on an exhilarating journey around the globe, showcasing the most unique and intense competitions the world has to offer. In this episode, high skills, a passion for technology, an impatience for innovation, and a pure love for adrenaline are combined at their best. Buckle up, rev your engines, and get ready for some electrifying action as you experience the thrill of full G-force! The episode kicks off with Hellas Rally Raid. The Hellas Rally Raid is an international off-road motorsports event held annually in the landscapes of Greece. Spanning 7 days, it challenges riders and drivers to navigate through hundreds of...

programme.title: BRX 2025: Rounds 1 -2 -3: Review
programme.desc: Take a look at the first three rounds of the 2025 Belgian Rallycross Championship.

programme.title: Motorsport Images: An Enduring Legacy
programme.desc: 26 million images. 100 years of racing. This is the story of Motorsport Images, the premiere photographic agency and archive covering motorsport and motoring. It is unique in that it provides photography of all major current motorsport events, from Formula One Grand Prix racing to national level racing, as well as archive images documenting the history of the sport dating back to 1895.

programme.title: TCR South America 2025 | Round 6: El Pinar - Race 1 |
programme.desc: Watch race 1 of the sixth round of the 2025 TCR South America season at El Pinar, Uruguay.

programme.title: Le Mans Classic 2025
programme.desc: Step back in time at Le Mans Classic, where we meet legendary race drivers and passionate car collectors to explore the enduring legacy of vintage machines. From the roaring icons of 1923 to the sleek speedsters of the ’90s, experience the full spectrum of historic racing — on and off the track.

programme.title: Fusion, Motorsport meets Sim Racing
programme.desc: BMW Motorsport merges reality and simulation. BMW Group Motorsport team collaborates with Fanatec to develop the new BMW M4 GT3 steering wheel.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #26: Formula Kite European Championships 2025
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.desc: We take a look at the Formula Kite European Championships 2025 - the pinnacle of high-speed sailing and cutting-edge kiteboard racing! The fastest kitefoil athletes in the world have gathered to compete against the wind and the water

programme.title: Racing Unleashed - Cham (SUI) & World Rowing Indoor Championship - Paris (FRA)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2020
programme.desc: In Racing Unleashed, a virtual racing game makes players sweat as they compete for a prize of CHF 30,000.00 for the winner AND The 2020 World Indoor Rowing Championships is in its third year, attracting athletes from a record number of 51 countries.

programme.title: Natural Track Luge World Cup 2019/20 Final - Umhausen (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2020
programme.desc: Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - Stop 2 - Kicking Horse (CAN)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2020
programme.desc: Between February 06th – 12th the second stop of the Freeride World Tour 2020 will take place in Golden B.C. Kicking Horse, Canada. After the season kick off in Japan, the world’s best freeriders in the categories ski & snowboard men and women will battle it out again.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #3 - Kicking Horse (CAN)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Freeride World Tour 2022 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 3rd stop. This takes place in Canada at Kicking Horse Golden BC, (CAN). It will be exciting to see how the Tour continues after the first two spectacular stopps!

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Big Air Kite & GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships - Gran Canaria (ESP)
programme.desc: Gran Canaria will host the GKA Big Air Kite World Championships and the GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships in July 2024. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the titles and show impressive skills in kiteboarding and wingfoiling.

programme.title: Far Away
programme.desc: Matthias Haunholder and Matthias Mayr present a big mountain freeski film, primarily shot in Austria. Through stunning ski footage and heartfelt interviews, the film explores the intense emotions of parents and loved ones as they cope with the risks faced by the skiers.

programme.title: Most Wanted
programme.desc: New to the line-up this year, veteran Storm Show producer Darrell Miller has teamed up with Full Room Productions’ Ryan Halverson, bringing you more hard-hitting, action-packed, gnar-shredding from the Jackson Hole backcountry.

programme.title: Cerro Torre Fly & Climb
programme.desc: The West Face route with its long glacier approach through the Circo de los Altares certainly feels ‘out there’. That the whole team were able to take off from the summit with their paragliders is a testament to their skill, both as climbers and as pilots.

programme.title: Climb
programme.desc: Triathlete Neil Myers was nearly killed in a horrific training accident on Gibraltar Road in 2018. One year later he an his team won the 2019 Santa Barbara Triathlon.

programme.title: Meet Connor Herson
programme.desc: Connor Herson pushes the limits of what is possible on the rock. But his latest and greatest challenge? Balancing a life climbing cutting edge ascents with his studies at Stanford.

programme.title: New Zealand Winter Games 2022 Episode #03
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: Die Stomp Show-Events = Park Jam und Big Air - das sind innovative, stilbezogene Wettbewerbe, bei denen die Athleten ihr Talent und ihr Können unter Beweis stellen können.

programme.title: Episode 31
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 31

programme.title: WOF 2025 #27: Epic Series - 4 Islands
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.desc: The 4Islands Epic is a legendary stage race as part of the Epic Series, which takes place on the Croatian islands of the Kvarner region - Lošinj, Cres, Krk and occasionally Rab - and offers around 260 km and 5,600 vertical meters over five days (prologue + four stages).

programme.title: WOF 2025 #28: Queen & King of the Court 2025
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.desc: The spectacular Queen & King of the Court 2025 beach volleyball event returns to Hamburg from May 23 to 25! For the fifth time in a row, the best players in the world will compete against each other in Hamburg. Level brought to life.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #29: World Downhill Skateboarding Championships - Axamer, Lizum (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E29 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.desc: The World Downhill Skateboarding Championships in Axamer Lizum, Austria, kicked off the 2025 season from June 13 to 15. Around 80 riders from more than 15 countries competed over three days of training, qualifying runs and finals.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Prologue Day
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2022 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 4th stop. This takes place in Austria at Fieberbrunn, (AUT). It is exciting to see what the first stop of the final has to offer after the spectacular three qualifying stages!

programme.title: Searching for the Rivergod II
programme.sub-title: S01 : E54 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: The documentary "Searching for the River God - The Journey continues" shows in fantastic images extreme kayaking on the most attractive and remote rivers in the world in Siberia, the jungles of Mexico and in Iceland.

programme.title: adidas Sickline - Extreme Kayak World Championship - The Documentary
programme.sub-title: S01 : E55 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: This is the documentary about the history of the famous "Wellerbrücke" rapids, a famous section of the glacier-fed Ötztaler Ache river in Tyrol, and the adidas Sickline Extreme Kayak World Championship.

programme.title: Outdoorsports Team - The Fascination of ski Mountaineering
programme.sub-title: S01 : E56 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: The film “Fascination of Ski Mountaineering” shows four top Austrian athletes doing high-alpine ski mountaineering from the Mittelbergjoch over the Taschach Glacier to the Wildspitze.

programme.title: Canyoning 2008
programme.sub-title: S01 : E57 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: Canyoning is one of the most exciting outdoor sports and for many it is a true decathlon of extreme activities. Physical fitness, team spirit and trust are of the utmost importance.

programme.title: adidas Outdoorsports Team 2012: Canyoning - Unicycling - Slacklining
programme.sub-title: S01 : E58 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: Modern outdoor sport has many facets. Today we follow the Outdoor Sports Team for venturesome jumps, fast downhills and balancing acts in dizzy heights. We start in Ticino.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile Dani Arnold - The Art of Iceclimbing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: Daniel Arnold was born in 1984 in the Swiss canton of Uri and grew up in the small mountain village of Biel in the heart of the Swiss Alps. Dani and his brother experience all aspects of mountain life: hiking, skiing and climbing in some of the toughest climbing locations in the world

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Sal is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the best wingfoilers in the world will meet for an exciting competition. This paradise in Cape Verde is known for its strong winds and rolling Atlantic waves.

programme.title: Defender GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sylt (GER) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Stopover of the kite surfing discipline on the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour in Sylt, Germany. The Defender GKA Kite World Cup Sylt is held in two disciplines - Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air.

programme.title: Episode 31
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 31

programme.title: Gordon Bennett Cup 2024 - Münster (GER)
programme.desc: The Coupe Aéronautique Gordon Bennett, the FAI long-distance world championship for gas balloon pilots, is the oldest and most prestigious event in aviation and the ultimate challenge for pilots. Goal is to cover the greatest distance to the launch site without stopping

programme.title: Copa Kitley Qatar Airways GKA Kite-Surf World Cup Brazil 2022
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: Nach den beeindruckenden Freestyle-Finals, die Anfang des Monats in der Taiba-Lagune ausgetragen wurden, sind nun die Kite-Surfer an der Reihe, ihre Weltmeister beim letzten Event der Saison zu ermitteln.

programme.title: NEOM Titan Desert Dash Saudi Arabia - Neom (KSA)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: NEOM Titan Desert Saudi-Arabien ist viel mehr als ein MTB-Rennen. Es ist ein viertägiges Abenteuer mit ständigen sportlichen Herausforderungen.

programme.title: King of the Court 2022 - Niterói, Rio de Janeiro (BRA)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: Die dritte Station der King of the Court Crown Serie 2022 findet in Niterói, Rio de Janeiro, statt.

programme.title: Nedbank Desert Dash 2022 - Namibia (NAM)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: The Desert Dash is more than an endurance mountain bike race, it's a wild beast that lures you and challenges you. It is a 393 km long, 24 hour battle between man and nature, body and spirit.

programme.title: The Barrel - Part I
programme.sub-title: S01 : E59 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: "The Barrel" is a cinematic tribute to moments in big waves. This program takes a journey to some legendary barrel destinations - Hawaii's Pipeline, Indonesia and Kirra on Australia's Gold Coast.

programme.title: The Barrel - Part II
programme.sub-title: S01 : E60 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: The Barrel is a cinematic tribute to those big-wave moments. This program takes a journey to some legendary barrel destinations - Hawaii's Pipeline, Indonesia and Kirra on Australia's Gold Coast.

programme.title: The history of competitive Snowboarding
programme.sub-title: S01 : E61 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: This Competition is in human nature. But that was far from the thoughts of early pioneers in the nineteen hundreds or those of Mister Sherman Poppin of Michigan. In the Christmas of 1965 he invented the Snurfer. This changed the history of snowsports.

programme.title: Eternal Flame
programme.desc: To jump from the top of Nameless Tower in Pakistan (6200m) after climbing the Eternal Flame route is to combine the ascent of one of the most beautiful climbing routes in the world with the opening of one of the most breathtaking BASE jumping exits imaginable.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #01
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - Stop 3 - Ordino Arcalis (AND)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2020
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2020 is on its way to Europe for its third stop in Ordino Arcalis. The best in the world will try to hold the line at the Ordino Arcalís in Andorra from February 28th to March 4th.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Stop 4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2020
programme.desc: The fourth and penultimate stop of the Freeride World Tour 2020 is just a few days away. Since many drivers want to make it to the finals in Verbier and the FWT 2021, they will give their best in Fieberbrunn from March 7th to 13th.

programme.title: Engadinsnow - Silvaplana (SUI)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2020
programme.desc: ENGADINSNOW is one of the oldest freeride competitions in the Alps. It is the world's only parallel freeride event. Teams of two ride the Corvatsch north face at the same time and compete with other teams.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #5 - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Freeride World Tour 2022 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The final showdown of the Freeride World Tour 2022 is right around the corner and it’ll take place in Verbier, Switzerland between 26th of March and 3rd of April.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Prologue Day
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle-Kite World Cup 2022 - Taiba (BRA)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: Die letzte Runde der Freestyle-Disziplin auf der Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour beginnt am Dienstag, 8. November. Beim Freestyle-Kite World Cup Taiba messen sich die besten Freestyle-Kiter der Welt bei perfekten Bedingungen auf der berüchtigten Lagune.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #1 - Baqueira Beret (ESP)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 startet im Januar in ihre 16. Saison - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus aller Welt! Der erste Stopp der Tour findet in Baqueira Beret statt.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #2 - Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihren zweiten Stopp in Ordino Arcalís Pro, Andorra - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus der ganzen Welt! Damit kehrt die FWT in das Freeride-Mekka der Pyrenäen zurück.

programme.title: Mediterranean Epic 2023
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: Die 4. Edition des Mediterranean Epic ist der Auftakt der Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Es ist ein 4-tägiges Rennen (UCI Hors Catégorie), das in Castellón, Oropesa del Mar (Spanien), stattfindet.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #05
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA Championship Middle East - Saudi Baja Hall
programme.desc: The Saudi Baja is an important event in the FIA Middle East Baja Cup series. It takes place from January 30 to February 1, 2025 and serves as the opening round of the FIA World Cup for Cross-Country Bajas and the FIM Bajas World Cup.

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Park Jam Team Challenge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024
programme.desc: Building on the success of the Big Air, get ready for the next thrilling New Zealand Winter Games episode, The Park Jam Team Challenge! Witness the fusion of skill and creativity as Freestyle Skiers and Snowboarders showcase their prowess in this high-energy competition.

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: 2025 Open Faces Obertauern Challenger - FWQ FINALS - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour Challenger in Obertauren provides the big stage for the final decisions on qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2026. The elite of the Challenger riders meet for the final decision at the very last contest

programme.title: Episode 31
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 31

programme.title: Swatch Freeride World Tour 2015 - 20th Anniversary Xtreme Verbier - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E63 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: 2015 is the year of the 20th anniversary of Xtreme Verbier. As the legendary wall of the Bec des Rosses has always been one of the most spectacular places for freeriding and has also hosted the final of the Freeride World Tour for years, it is now time to look back!

programme.title: Bike2Boat
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2021
programme.desc: In the Bike 2 Boat adventurewe set off on a climate-neutral journey through the Alps together with four kayakers. We will accompany them on their search for extraordinary kayak spots and unforgettable experiences.

programme.title: A Song for Tomorrow
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2021
programme.desc: This April, Mayan Smith-Gobat and Ben Rueck joined China's renowned mountaineers Liu Yongbang (Abond) and Xiao Ting on an expedition to explore the Qingfeng Valley on the border of Zhangjiajie, China's first and largest national park.

programme.title: Extremsportveko "The Beauty of Outdoor Sports"
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2021
programme.desc: Today, we travel all the way up to Voss, the adventure Capital of Norway, where the “Extremesportsveko” takes place once a year. During this week, national and international athletes compete and challenge themselves in their elements.

programme.title: APP – History, Legacy and Best Moments
programme.sub-title: S01 : E25 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2021
programme.desc: In this weeks episode we´re taking a closer Look at the APP, the association of paddleboard professionals. From the contests, to the unique trips and fascinating personalities. So, grab you boardshorts and sunglasses. Today we´re going to the beach.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.sub-title: S01 : E48 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.sub-title: S01 : E48 WOF Evergreens
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Fuwairit (QAT)
programme.desc: Fuwairit Beach is the venue for the Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best freestyle kiteboarders put their skills to the test. With constant wind, this hotspot in Qatar offers the perfect conditions for the competitions.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Cauipe (BRA)
programme.desc: The Cauipe lagoon is the venue for the Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. The Brazilian paradise offers the perfect playground for explosive tricks.

programme.title: One Water Race 2024 52min
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: Mediterranean Epic 2023
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: Die 4. Edition des Mediterranean Epic ist der Auftakt der Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Es ist ein 4-tägiges Rennen (UCI Hors Catégorie), das in Castellón, Oropesa del Mar (Spanien), stattfindet.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #3 - Kicking Horse Golden BC Pro (CAN)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: Der 3. Stopp der Freeride World Tour 2023 bringt uns nach Kanada zum Kicking Horse Golden BC Pro, (CAN).

programme.title: Digital & Virtual Sport Special Gaming Docu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: Restart the Game 2023 & ICF Open Virtual World Cup & World Rowing Indoor Championship

programme.title: Golden Fly Series Genf (SUI) 2024 - Part 1
programme.desc: Geneva will host the Golden Fly Series 2024 athletics spectacle for the first time! On Saturday 21 Sep, the world's best long jumpers and pole vaulters will be competing for important world ranking points on the largest mobile World Athletics-certified athletics facility in the world.

programme.title: Episode 31
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 31

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Back Country Freestyle Challenge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024
programme.desc: Back to the third episode of the New Zealand Winter Games 2023! This time, we dive into the exhilarating world of Back Country Freestyle, where athletes shows their skills in the untouched winter landscapes in the southern Alps of New Zealand. Get ready for an adrenaline-packed adventure!

programme.title: Gold Coast Marathon 2024
programme.desc: The ASICS Gold Coast Marathon, a World Athletics Label Road Race, is the pinnacle of road running events in Australia and during its history has distinguished itself as one of the most prestigious marathons in the world.

programme.title: Greenlandic
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024
programme.desc: In today´s episode we have the ultimate journey into the heart of Greenland´s rich culture and untamed backcountry. Join us as we explore the breathtaking landcapes of this Artic wonderland. It´s the paradise for every passionate freeskier. Let´s check out!

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #01

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Best Of Season 2020 - Worldwide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2020
programme.desc: The first stop of this year's Freeride World Tour was in Hakuba, Japan. Next the tour went to Kicking Horse in British Columbia. The third stop took the riders to Ordino Arcalis in the Pyrenees. The last stop was Fieberbrunn in Austria.

programme.title: Tankwa Trek 2020 - Koue Bokkeveld (RSA)

programme.desc: The Momentum Medical Scheme Tankwa Trek is truly a ride like no other. South Africa's premier four-day stage race takes place as one of the first UCI events of the season.

programme.title: Behind The Nines - Sölden (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2020
programme.desc: This is a behind-the-scenes look at one of Europe's most prestigious ski and snowboard events - the Audi Nines. On the avant-garde course with new features, the laws of gravity seem to be constantly being rewritten.

programme.title: 2025 Open Faces Obertauern Challenger - FWQ FINALS - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour Challenger in Obertauren provides the big stage for the final decisions on qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2026. The elite of the Challenger riders meet for the final decision at the very last contest

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #02
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Episode 31

programme.title: One Water Race 2024 52min
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: King of the Court 2022 Finals – Doha (QAT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: King of the Court 2022 Finals - January 11th-14th, Doha (QAT. )Das zweite Jahr in Folge ist die Aspire Zone Gastgeber für die King of the Court Crown Series.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihren vierten Stopp in Fieberbrunn, Österreich - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus aller Welt! Der erste Teil des FWT-Finales findet in Fieberbrunn statt, wo die Athleten den imposanten Wildseeloder bezwingen müssen. Dieser Berg ist selbst für die erfahrensten Profis ein echter Härtetest und die Athleten werden sicherlich alles geben müssen.

programme.title: Golden Fly Series 2023 - Bangkok (THA)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: Das etablierte innerstädtische Leichtathletikspektakel, die Golden Fly Series 2023, kehrte nach seinem ersten Auftritt in Phuket im Jahr 2021 nach Thailand zurück und fand in der Hauptstadt des Landes, Bangkok, statt.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic 2023 - Best of MEN
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: Das ABSA Cape Epic ist das weltweit bedeutendste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt aufstrebende Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus aller Welt über 648 ungezähmte Kilometer durch unberührte Landschaften.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship 2024
programme.desc: MotoSurf World Championship in Croatia: This year, when the championship hosted the qualification for the World Games as part of the Championship, 109 racers representing 21 different countries and 3 continents competed in Zadar.

programme.title: Queen & King of the Court #04
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024
programme.desc: The sands of Doha are set to witness the grand finale of the 2023 Queen & King of the Court Crown Series, marking the culmination of a thrilling series of events that kicked off in Miami earlier this year.

programme.title: A Plea For Refuge
programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paraglider's across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Highlight Show BMX
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour Challenger in Obertauren provides the big stage for the final decisions on qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2026. The elite of the Challenger riders meet for the final decision at the very last contest

programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2021
programme.desc: Today’s episode is an exciting show about a unique kayak expedition to Norway’s white-water treasures at the Arctic Circle. Expect remote mountains, raging rivers and challenging rapids!

programme.title: Emocean - Surf Documentary
programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2021
programme.desc: Today we take you on an unparalleled surf trip to some of the most famous, as well most terrifying waves on the planet. We will listen to some intimate stories of extraordinary people literally living IN and WITH the ocean.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2017
programme.desc: laska has always been a dream-riding destination for 28-year-old American mountain biker Andrew Taylor. But being over 3,000 miles away from his hometown Santa Cruz, it seemed a bit too far to just jump in the truck and go.

programme.desc: Monte Rosa: the highest mountain range in Switzerland with the Dufourspitze, its highest peak, at 4,634m in altitude, is home to the longest mountain pass in the Alps: the Marinelli. It also harbours a dream... Géraldine Fasnacht’s dream.

programme.desc: "Catch the Moment" profiles athletes from around the world, including American longboard surfer Kassia Meador. Kassia is constantly exploring new creative endeavors and travels the world for surfing and photography trips.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 – Jericoacoara (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour will electrify the coast of Jericoacoara, Brazil, with competitions in its three big air divisions - TwinTip, Hydrofoil and Surfboard. A total of 57 athletes will be competing for the world championship titles at the premiere.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #1 Japan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Freeride World Tour 2020
programme.desc: The season kick-off of the world’s most important freeride series for skiers and snowboarders will be held at Hakuba (JPN).

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Season Recap

programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihr großes Finale in Xtreme Verbier, Schweiz - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus der ganzen Welt!

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: Die ITF Beach Tennis World Tour Sand Series Classics 2023 startet am 18. und 19. März mit ihrer ersten Station in Réunion (FRA). Beachtennis ist eine schnell wachsende Sportart und eine Kombination aus Tennis, Beachvolleyball und Badminton.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 – Cauipe (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 will host the second stop of the freestyle discipline in Cauipe in north-eastern Brazil. The Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup offers intense competitions in the shallow waters.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Highlight Show Skate
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E11 Stage 11 - SCL Poland 2023
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E12 Stage 12 - SCL Poland 2023
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E13 Stage 13 - SCL Cyprus 2023
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 14, Estonia
programme.desc: Episode 14 takes place in Estonia where drama and world records will be seen again

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)
programme.desc: Taking place over 2 days in Malaysia, this is part 1 of the world finals of Strongman Champions League!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)
programme.desc: Who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League - we find out who is crowned as world champion today in the second part of the final epsiode

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E08 GLORY 96 Rotterdam
programme.desc: A Champ vs. Champ superfight takes place in the main event as GLORY welterweight world champion Chico Kwasi (43-5, 23 KO) puts his title on the line against GLORY lightweight world champ Tyjani Beztati (27-4, 9 KO). programme.sub-title: S00 : E02 GLORY 6 Istanbul

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E09 COLLISION 7
programme.desc: In the main event, ‘The King of Kickboxing’ Rico Verhoeven put his GLORY world heavyweight title on the line against number one contender ‘The Prince’ Levi Rigters in a hotly anticipated rematch from their GLORY Grand Prix final earlier this year. GLORY light heavyweight world champion Tarik Khbabez will collide with Donegi Abena in a trilogy fight to end their heated rivalry in the co-main event.

programme.desc: GLORY 07: Milan at the Mediolanum Forum in Milan, Italy April 20, 2013. This event featured a super fight between Giorgio Petrosyan and Hafid El Boustati as headliner. In co-main event, Murthel Groenhart had to battle with fellow superstar Robin van Roosmalen, this event also featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E10 GLORY 97 Featherweight Grand Prix
programme.desc: Eight of the best and most exciting featherweights on the planet go head-to-head in a one-night tournament. GLORY featherweight champion Petch (170-40-3, 27 KO) goes up against former RISE champion Taiju Shiratori (30-10-1, 12 KO), the in-form Berjan Peposhi (30-4, 16 KO) takes on ‘The Korean Monster’ Sunghyun Lee (69-11-2, 17 KO), the always exciting Abraham Vidales (16-3, 13 KO) collides with current RISE champ Chadd Collins (63-17-2, 32 KO), and number one ranked GLORY featherweight Miguel Trindade (59-6, 24 KO) faces RISE great & former GLORY title contender Kento Haraguchi (26-4-1, 17 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY 98 Rotterdam
programme.desc: GLORY 98 features the highly anticipated return of Jamal Ben Saddik (36-9, 29 KO) against the Estonian powerhouse Uku Jürjendal (20-9, 16 KO). In the co-main event of the evening, GLORY Welterweight World Champion Chico Kwasi (43-5-1, 23 KO) is set to defend his title against number two ranked welterweight Teodor Hristov (18-3, 7 KO). Meanwhile, two of 2024’s best prospects will clash as Cem Caceres (18-1, 14 KO) faces Mory Kromah (31-2-1, 18 KO).

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Jesse Arnett attributes most of his success to his coaches, in particular Jake Peacock. Jake was born with only a partial arm. This coach and fighter doesn't let that stop him from training some of the best athletes in the world.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Dean Schmeichel has been coaching for over 20 years. Despite the allure of working as a full time wrestling coach in the martial arts industry, he has instead dedicated himself to work with kids and coaching school sports. Wrestling continues to be an interal part of Dean's life, and he finds the most satisfaction in helping athletes to understand and fall in love with the sport, as he did.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: CJ Hollett is a Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Black Belt who loves teaching his craft. He is very well respected as an MMA coach for his technical mindset, high level skills and experience coaching UFC fighters. CJ loves working with MMA fighters because of their hunger to win, and believes it's time for Jiu Jitsu to make a resurgence in the MMA cage.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E246 Undercover Love S1 E246
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E84 Gangaa S1 E84
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.sub-title: S02 : E159 Mehek S2 E159
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E246 Dholi Beats S1 E246
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E246 King of Hearts S1 E246
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E246 Second Chances S1 E246
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E40 Jodha Akbar S3 E40
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E246 This is Fate S1 E246
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.sub-title: S01 : E246 Trinayani S1 E246
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.sub-title: S01 : E54 Guddan S1 E54
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.sub-title: S01 : E248 Undercover Love S1 E248
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E86 Gangaa S1 E86
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.sub-title: S02 : E161 Mehek S2 E161
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E2
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E248 King of Hearts S1 E248
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E248 Second Chances S1 E248
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E42 Jodha Akbar S3 E42
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.
